API Reference¶

Application Initilization¶

The run module’s only purpose is to launch the application server with options.

run.run_application()[source]¶

starts the web application server

This module first fixes several blocking modules to be be non-blocking, then imports the required modules from the application. Then the application object is created and the server is started.

Advantages:
  • Initiating the application object and keeping it isolated from the submodules of the application keeps it from being unnecessarily tinkered with and behavior being modified in unexpected ways.

Application Object Instantiation¶

app.create_app(debug=False)[source]¶
